EmailTemplate.name: Course Assignment Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: NCT Course assignment for {!Course_Assignment__c.PSA_Area__c}/{!Course_Assignment__c.Course__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Course_Assignment__c.OwnerFirstName}, {!Course_Assignment__c.Name}, relating to Course {!Course_Assignment__c.Course__c}, has been rejected by {!Course_Assignment__c.OwnerFullName} with the following comments: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments} King Regards, {!Course_Assignment__c.CreatedBy} Course Organazer
